title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Televised Address on Ukraine
author: admin
summary: The televised address made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 24 February 2022.
content:
In this dark hour, our thoughts, our solidarity, and our resolve are with the Ukrainian people.
